name: Inner Demons (KeithComet)
description:
Inner Demons was created by a 3-person team in a 7-day period for 7DRL 2021

Keith: Design, Programming, Maintaining data-driven component-based finite-state to-do lists
Dan: Programming, Coming up with crazy names like renderoo and oobloct
Chris (little stray): 3D Modeling, Music, Adorning demons with trendy eyewear
2d assets are from Kenney.nl
